amendment.description: Amendment implements several recommendations of the Select Committee on China including reports on technology transfers, satellite export controls, and export of high performance computers; and establishes counterintelligence programs and other security programs at the Department of Energy.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 14, printed in the Congressional Record to implement several recommendations of the Select Committee on China including reports on technology transfers, satellite export controls, and export of high performance computers; and establishes counterintelligence programs and other security programs at the Department of Energy. and the.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cox amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 428 - 0 (Roll no. 180).
